tooltip.monsoon.axe.broken:
A... broken tool that could have been used for resolving conflict bitterly or gather wood, 
 now all it can do is waste space...
tooltip.monsoon.axe.fixed:
A great tool to gather wood and heads- 
 I MEAN peacefully resolve conflict!
tooltip.monsoon.crisp: An odd metal that's kind of like gold, a great currency!
tooltip.monsoon.pickaxe.broken:
A... broken tool that used to be great for gathering rocks and minerals, 
 it can no longer do so...
tooltip.monsoon.pickaxe.fixed:
An old yet trusty tool gathering rocks and minerals. 
 It's age is apparent.
tooltip.monsoon.shovel.broken:
A... broken tool that could have been used for excavating. 
 It can't even be used for nefarious uses at this state.
tooltip.monsoon.shovel.fixed:
An tool used primarily for excavating dirt! 
 That doesn't mean it can't be used for more... nefarious things.
